bill_title: require certification for operators of boilers in public buildings.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require certification for operators of boilers in public buildings. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 34-29A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person may operate a boiler in a public building unless the person is certified by the department to operate a boiler. A violation of this section is a Class 1 misdemeanor. Section 2. That chapter 34-29A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The department shall, pursuant to chapter 1-26, promulgate rules to establish procedures and standards for certifying boiler operators, including eligibility for, denial, suspension, and revocation of, and renewal of certification, and to establish fees for certification and renewal, not to exceed fifty dollars. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
